entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
